item.description:
Update - We are now on Facebook under "Connecticut's Viva Italia Group

Meet and mingle with Italians or those who love the culture and people. Come to a Connecticut Viva Italia Meetup and make new amici as you practice speaking, eating, dancing and just having fun. You don't have to be Italian to join, nor do you have to be fluent in Italian. No pressures sit and listen if you'd like. You're not being judged or graded on your level of speaking Italian.

Ciao 4 now!
item.name: Connecticut's Viva Italia Meetup Group
